alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 7:41AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern La Crosse and Monroe Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 740 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Sparta to near Bangor to near Coon Valley. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sparta around 745 AM CDT. Cashton around 750 AM CDT. Fort Mc Coy around 755 AM CDT. Tomah around 800 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
